author: mikem
msg: DERBY-4413 INSERT from SELECT DISTINCT gives assertFailure (sane), or NPE (insane) in presence of generated columns
back porting svn #829410 from trunk to 10.5 branch.
Patch DERBY-4413-2 makes sort accept columns that are null. In sane mode, it is checked that in such a case, the
empty column is not part of the sort key.

author: pero
msg: Fix NPE and add small test case to check VirtualWebappLoader.

author: pero
msg: Fix Bug 49528 - HttpServletRequest.isAsyncStarted() returns false when a Runnable is started
Todo: Why we doesn't start directly a container thread with asyncContext.start()?
Currently we start user runnable as an internal forward.
